ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Charming in the outdoors (And fast mobs)
ygData.msgSnippet: No no, I m recharming my thrall. 1. Charm pet 2. Select target 3. mash /pet kill 4. F1 twice (retarget pet) 5. 2 pulse of selos or heal or mez an add or
ygData.messageBody:
No no, I'm recharming my thrall.

1. Charm pet
2. Select target
3. mash /pet kill
4. F1 twice (retarget pet)
5. 2 pulse of selos or heal or mez an add or something
6. pause a heartbeat
7. start charm, by the time it fires the pet has just broken free.

It works swimmingly with everything except giants. Gobs, frogs, skels,
bugs, beasts.. whatever. Just not giants or Griff*'s.

The problem I'm getting is like when a necro sends in the pet and the
target inches towards the necro but turns back for a second every time
it gets hit. Still trying to think of a way around it.
